board.name: hpc_xc7k325t
board.description: HPC FPGA Store Kintex 7 XC7K325T FPGA Development Board

interface.name: ddr3_sdram
interface.description: DDR3 board interface, it can use MIG IP for connection.

interface.name: sfp_a_iic
interface.description: Secondary interface for SFP A to communicate with SFP module.

interface.name: sfp_b_iic
interface.description: Secondary interface for SFP B to communicate with SFP module.

interface.name: hdmi_ddc
interface.description: HDMI DDC -- I2C Display Data Channel

component.name: sysclk_200
component.description: 2.5V LVDS differential 200 MHz oscillator used as system clock on the board

component.name: sysclk_100
component.description: 2.5V single-ended 100 MHz oscillator used as system clock on the board

component.name: push_buttons
component.description: Push Buttons K2, K3 Active Low

component.name: leds
component.description: LEDs 7 to 0, Active Low; 2 to 0 are also visible externally.

component.name: usb_uart
component.description: USB-to-UART Bridge, which allows a connection to a host computer with a USB port

component.name: iic_eeprom
component.description: I2C 24C04 EEPROM; 4kb (512 bytes) of non-volatile storage

component.name: qspi_flash
component.description: 256Mb (32MB) of nonvolatile storage that can be used for configuration or data storage

component.name: sd_card
component.description: 256Mb (32MB) of nonvolatile storage that can be used for configuration or data storage

component.name: phy_sfp_a
component.description: PHY outside the board connected through SFP+ port A.

component_mode.name: sfp_a_sgmii
component_mode.display_name: SFP A SGMII using 156.25MHz MGT Clock

component.name: phy_sfp_b
component.description: PHY outside the board connected through SFP+ port B.

component_mode.name: sfp_b_sgmii
component_mode.display_name: SFP B SGMII using 156.25MHz MGT Clock
